sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.MNG_YEAR , A.MNG_NO , A.MNG_CNT , A.MNG_YEAR || '-' || A.MNG_NO || '-' || A.MNG_CNT AS RENT_MNG_NO , A.ENTRPSCD , A.DT , A.REQST_SE_CD , A.GR_AR , A.GR_FEE , A.NTIC_MTH , A.FRST_PRMISN_DT , A.PRMISN_DT , A.PRMISN_YN , A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM , A.GR_USAGE_PD_TO , A.DOC_NO , A.RM , A.CMT , A.ETC , A.REG_USR , A.REGIST_DT , A.UPD_USR , A.UPDT_DT , A.GR_RDCXPT_FEE , A.GIS_CD , A.DEPTCD FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND A.REQST_SE_CD = #sReqstSeCd#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND A.MNG_NO = #sMngNo#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM >= #sGrUsagePdFrom#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_TO <= #sGrUsagePdTo#
AND A.GR_AR = #sGrAr#
ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND A.REQST_SE_CD = #sReqstSeCd#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND A.MNG_NO = #sMngNo#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM >= #sGrUsagePdFrom#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_TO <= #sGrUsagePdTo#
AND A.GR_AR = #sGrAr#

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) SUM_CNT , NVL(SUM(GR_AR),0) SUM_GR_AR , NVL(SUM(GR_FEE),0) SUM_GR_FEE FROM ASSETS_RENT_F WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND A.REQST_SE_CD = #sReqstSeCd#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND A.MNG_NO = #sMngNo#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM >= #sGrUsagePdFrom#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_TO <= #sGrUsagePdTo#
AND A.GR_AR = #sGrAr#

SELECT A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.MNG_YEAR , A.MNG_NO , A.MNG_CNT , A.ENTRPSCD , A.DT , A.REQST_SE_CD , A.GR_AR , A.GR_FEE , A.NTIC_MTH , A.FRST_PRMISN_DT , A.PRMISN_DT , A.PRMISN_YN , A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM , A.GR_USAGE_PD_TO , A.DOC_NO , A.RM , A.CMT , A.ETC , A.REG_USR , A.REGIST_DT , A.UPD_USR , A.UPDT_DT , A.GR_RDCXPT_FEE , A.GIS_CD , A.DEPTCD FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode# AND A.MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND A.MNG_NO = #mngNo# AND A.MNG_CNT = #mngCnt#

SELECT MAX(MNG_NO) MAX_MNG_NO FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = #rPrtAtCode# AND A.MNG_YEAR = #rMngYear#
AND A.MNG_CNT = #rMngCnt#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ASSETS_RENT_F ( PRT_AT_CODE , MNG_YEAR , MNG_NO , MNG_CNT ) VALUES ( #prtAtCode# , #mngYear# , #mngNo# , #mngCnt# )

INSERT INTO ASSETS_RENT_F ( PRT_AT_CODE , MNG_YEAR , MNG_NO , MNG_CNT , ENTRPSCD , DT , REQST_SE_CD , GR_AR , GR_FEE , NTIC_MTH , FRST_PRMISN_DT , PRMISN_DT , PRMISN_YN , GR_USAGE_PD_FROM , GR_USAGE_PD_TO , DOC_NO , RM , CMT , ETC , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT , GR_RDCXPT_FEE , GIS_CD , DEPTCD ) SELECT A.PRT_AT_CODE , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') , MNG_NO , MNG_CNT + 1 , ENTRPSCD , DT , REQST_SE_CD , GR_AR , GR_FEE , NTIC_MTH , FRST_PRMISN_DT , PRMISN_DT , PRMISN_YN , GR_USAGE_PD_FROM , GR_USAGE_PD_TO , DOC_NO , RM , CMT , ETC , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT , GR_RDCXPT_FEE , GIS_CD , DEPTCD FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = #rPrtAtCode# AND MNG_YEAR = #rMngYear# AND MNG_NO = #rMngNo# AND MNG_CNT = #rMngCnt#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT A.ASSETS_USAGE_SEQ , A.GIS_ASSETS_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , A.USAGE_AR , A.USAGE_PD_FROM , A.USAGE_PD_TO , A.USAGE_PURPS , A.USAGE_DTLS , A.USAGE_PRPOS_CD , A.EXEMPT_SE , A.EXEMPT_RSN_CD , A.EXEMPT_RSN , A.EXEMPT_PD_FROM , A.EXEMPT_PD_TO , A.COMPUT_DTLS , A.OLNLP , A.APPLC_TARIFF , A.APPLC_MTH , A.PACK_SE , A.ENTRPS_SE , A.FEE_CALC_SE , A.RDCXPT_FEE_CALC_SE , A.RDCXPT_FEE , A.FEE , A.TRMNAT_DT , A.TRMNAT_RSN , A.GIS_CD , A.REG_USR , A.REGIST_DT , A.UPD_USR , A.UPDT_DT , A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , A.MNG_YEAR , A.MNG_NO , A.MNG_CNT FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F A
A.MNG_YEAR = #detailMngYear#
ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F A
A.MNG_YEAR = #detailMngYear#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SAMPLE ( ID , NAME , DESCRIPTION , USE_YN , REG_USER ) VALUES ( #id# , #name# , #description# , #useYn# , #regUser# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SAMPLE SET ID=#id# , NAME=#name# , DESCRIPTION=#description# , USE_YN=#useYn# WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USE_YN, REG_USER FROM SAMPLE WHERE ID=#id#
